Class UnitSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • marytts.unitselection.select.UnitSelector
  • Direct Known Subclasses:

extends Object

      • selectUnits

        public List<SelectedUnit> selectUnits(List<Element> tokensAndBoundaries,
                             Voice voice)
                               throws SynthesisException
        Select the units for the targets in the given list of tokens and boundaries. Collect them in a list and return it.
        Parameters:
        tokensAndBoundaries - the token and boundary MaryXML elements representing an utterance.
        voice - the voice with which to synthesize
        Returns:
        a list of SelectedUnit objects
        Throws:
        SynthesisException - if no path for generating the target utterance could be found

      • createTargets

        protected List<Target> createTargets(List<Element> segmentsAndBoundaries)
        Create the list of targets from the XML elements to synthesize.
        Parameters:
        segmentsAndBoundaries - a list of MaryXML phone and boundary elements
        Returns:
        a list of Target objects
